result.execSummary:
The disposition of "Other" is used to indicate several different dispositions. The Charge(s)/Sentence(s) and Court Record Events sections of the WCCA record display additional information that must be reviewed in order to determine the exact disposition of the charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Zacharie Michael Bauer

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Adjourned Initial Appearance 6-8-15
Reported: Karen Blair
NOTICE OF MOTION AND MOTION FOR MODIFICATION OF CASH BAIL
Request to reschedule by Atty Gumz
Arraignment at 09-02-2015 02:30 pm

Defendant Zacharie Michael Bauer in court with attorney Mark Jay Gumz.  Defendant Zacharie Michael Bauer in custody.  Chad A. Hendee appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Atty Hendee states that this was set for a Motion by the defense and a Preliminary Hearing.
Atty Hendee states that regarding the motion; the State does not contest the motion.
BY THE COURT:  Court grants the defendant's motion to sever.

Atty Hendee asks that the charges be broken up with A & B.
Atty Gumz has no objection.
BY THE COURT:  Ct. 1 will be 15CF30A and Ct. 2 will be 15CF30B.

15CF30A:
 Atty Gumz states that the defendant will be waiving the Prelim today.  Atty Gumz has discussed the waiver with his client.  Court questions the defendant.  Defendant agrees with the waiver.  Court accepts the waiver of the Prelim.

  BY THE COURT:  Court finds probable cause that a felony was committed and this defendant committed it on 15CF30A.  Case bound over for trial or further proceedings.

Atty Hendee asks for some time to file the information with the two cases now.
Atty Gumz has no objection
BY THE COURT:  Set for Arraignment.

15CF30B:
 Atty Gumz states that the defendant will be waiving the Prelim today.  Atty Gumz has discussed the waiver with his client.  Court questions the defendant.  Defendant agrees with the waiver.  Court accepts the waiver of the Prelim.

  BY THE COURT:  Court finds probable cause that a felony was committed and this defendant committed it on 15CF30B.  Case bound over for trial or further proceedings.

Atty Hendee states that Ct. 2 on 15CF30 will now be listed as Ct. 1 in 15CF30B
Atty Gumz has no objection
BY THE COURT:  Set for Arraignment.



  Arraignment scheduled for September 2, 2015 at 02:30 pm.

Motion hearing at 08-19-2015 11:00 am.
Preliminary hearing at 08-19-2015 11:00 am.

Defendant Zacharie Michael Bauer in court with attorney Mark Jay Gumz.  Defendant Zacharie Michael Bauer in custody.  Chad A. Hendee appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Atty Hendee states that Atty Gumz has filed a motion to sever counts 1 & 2 and asks that the court set a Motion Hearing out to give the State time to respond.  
Atty Gumz agrees and asks the court to hear the motion to modify the cash bail.

BY THE COURT:  Court will set a Motion date.
Prelim will be set at that same time.

Atty Gumz states motion to modify the cash bail to $5,000 cash.
Atty Hendee objects to the bond modifcation and asks the court to deny the motion.
Atty Gumz responds.

BY THE COURT:  Court denies the motion to modify the cash bail; bond will remain the same.  Motion hearing scheduled for August 19, 2015 at 11:00 am.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for August 19, 2015 at 11:00 am.
AFFIDAVIT IN SUPPORT OF MOTION TO SEVER CHARGES - DEFENDANT'S
MOTION TO SEVER CHARGES

with conditions:
*No contact with the victim

Defendant Zacharie Michael Bauer in court with attorney Mark Jay Gumz.  Defendant Zacharie Michael Bauer in custody.  Chad A. Hendee appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Atty Gumz states motion to modify the bond to a $5,000 cash bond.  Atty Gumz states that the defendant's mother is present in the court and the defendant would be residing with her.
Atty Hendee objects to the bond modification.

BY THE COURT:  Court will modify the cash bond to a $10,000 cash bond; all conditions will remain the same.
State's
Motion hearing at 06-29-2015 10:30 am
NOTICE OF MOTION AND MOTION FOR MODIFICATION OF BAIL
Preliminary hearing at 07-22-2015 10:15 am

Defendant Zacharie Michael Bauer in court with attorney Mark Jay Gumz.  Defendant Zacharie Michael Bauer in custody.  Chad A. Hendee appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
  Atty Gumz states that the Defendant received a copy of the criminal complaint & waives it's reading.  Atty Gumz states that the defendant waives the time limits for the Prelim.

BY THE COURT:  Time limtis waived; Set Prelim.
bond continued.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for July 22, 2015 at 10:15 am.
STATEMENT OF COMPLIANCE
Adjourned initial appearance at 06-08-2015 02:30 pm

Defendant Zacharie Michael Bauer in court with attorney Mark Jay Gumz.  Chad A. Hendee appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Atty Gumz states that the Defendant has not yet received a copy of the criminal complaint; however, he is seeing it on the computer screen of the DA.  Atty Gumz would like some additional time and asks for an adjourned Initial Appearance.

BY THE COURT:  Set Adjourned Initial Appearance.
bond continued.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for June 8, 2015 at 02:30 pm.

with conditions:
